example.text: We agree that default is not an option. But the President can’t forget that House Republicans passed a bill to increase the debt limit and prevent a catastrophic default. By not participating in negotiations, he is the one risking default. [[url]]

Simpson Statement on Idaho Grizzly Bear ESA Listing The US Fish and Wildlife Service announced its decision to deny Idaho's petition to delist grizzly bears from the Endangered species Act. The State is capable of managing species on its own, and I will do what I can to help find a resolution to this important issue.

In addition to these accomplishments, candidates need to obtain a congressional nomination. This year I nominated nine candidates to the United States Air Force Academy, five to the United States Military Academy, 10 to the United States Naval Academy, and four to the United States Merchant Marine Academy.

In the end, we were successful in creating a diverse collaboration between stakeholders that included the World Center for Birds of Prey, Idaho Power Company, the Bureau of Land Management and the citizens of Idaho--something we can all be proud of. I am not sure what John is going to do next, but it better include pampering his incredible wife Linda who's put up with him for over 40 years.

The Limit, Save, Grow Act does NOT cut the veterans’ budget. It simply doesn’t. Claims that it does are fear-mongering tactics used by those who don’t want to face the harsh realities of our current budget situation. [[url]]
